entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
